record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, MARCH 5, 2007, at 1:30 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate today, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 1:02 p.m., adjourned until Monday, March 5, 2007, at 1:30 p.m.
